descriptions.dpv-pd:Name: Information about names associated or used as given name or nickname.
descriptions.dpv-pd:Fingerprint: Information about fingerprint used for biometric purposes.
descriptions.dpv-pd:Country: Information about country e.g. residence, travel.
descriptions.dpv-pd:BrowserHistory: Information about and including web browsing history.
descriptions.dpv-pd:communication: Information communicated from or to an individual.
descriptions.dpv-pd:Identifying: Information that uniquely or semi-uniquely identifies an individual or a group
descriptions.dpv-pd:Demographic: Information about demography and demographic characteristics
descriptions.dpv-pd:Contact: Information about contacts or used for contacting e.g. email address or phone number
descriptions.dpv-pd:Financial: Information about finance including monetary characteristics and transactions
descriptions.dpv-pd:Credit: Information about reputation with regards to money
descriptions.dpv-pd:Biometric: Information about biometrics and biometric characteristics.
descriptions.dpv:Marketing: Purposes associated with conducting Marketing in relation to organisation or products or services e.g. promoting, selling, and distributing.
descriptions.dpv:Advertising: Purposes associated with conducting Advertising i.e. process or artefact used to call attention to a product, service, etc. through announcements, notices, or other forms of communication.
descriptions.dpv:AcademicResearch: Purposes associated with conducting or assisting with research conducted in an academic context e.g. within universities.
descriptions.dpv:CommercialResearch: Purposes associated with conducting research in a commercial setting or with intention to commercialise e.g. in a company or sponsored by a company.
descriptions.dpv:CustomerCare: Customer Care refers to purposes associated with purposes for providing assistance, resolving issues, ensuring satisfaction, etc. in relation to services provided.
descriptions.dpv:SellDataToThirdParties: Purposes associated with selling or sharing data or information to third parties.
descriptions.dpv:IdentityVerification: Purposes associated with verifying or authorising identity as a form of security
descriptions.dpv:ServicePersonalisation: Purposes associated with providing personalisation within services or product or activities
descriptions.dpv:OptimisationForConsumer: Purposes associated with optimisation of activities and services for consumer or user
descriptions.dpv:OptimisationForController: Purposes associated with optimisation of activities and services for provider or controller
descriptions.dpv:FraudPreventionAndDetection: Purposes associated with fraud detection, prevention, and mitigation
descriptions.dpv:RequestedServiceProvision: Purposes associated with delivering services as requested by user or consumer
